wikipedia_page.main: Joe Howell (born 6 November 1996) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder. He was released by League One side Crewe Alexandra in July 2016 and is currently a free agent.

response: Joe (Stage) Howell is an American executive, producer and engineer. He has worked on various projects with artists such as The Notorious B.I.G. and Total. In 1996 he received ASCAP's Rhythm and Soul Award.Joe Howell bio He co-wrote the R&B Hit "Can't You See" performed by Total.
